name: n8n-automation
description: N8N automation tools and workflows (uses global N8N CLI)

scripts.export: echo '❌ CLI export fails with cloud - use: npm run export:api'
scripts.import: echo '❌ CLI import fails with cloud - use: npm run import:api'
scripts.export:all: echo '❌ CLI commands don't work with cloud instances'
scripts.export:creds: echo '❌ CLI commands don't work with cloud instances'
scripts.import:creds: echo '❌ CLI commands don't work with cloud instances'
scripts.cloud:export: echo '❌ CLI cloud commands don't work - use: npm run export:api'
scripts.cloud:import: echo '❌ CLI cloud commands don't work - use: npm run import:api'
scripts.cloud:export:creds: echo '❌ CLI cloud commands don't work'
scripts.cloud:import:creds: echo '❌ CLI cloud commands don't work'
scripts.status: echo 'Workflows:' && ls -la exports/ && echo 'Scripts:' && ls -la tools/
